docs.lead_paragraph: Gov. Phil Bryant signed a bill on Wednesday to ban abortion starting at the midpoint of a full-term pregnancy.

docs.lead_paragraph: That little voice nagging you to put down the cake and lace up the running shoes is increasingly coming from your employer and is likely to grow louder with a looming change under the federal health care overhaul.

headline.main: Wellness Programs Grow More Popular With Employers
headline.print_headline: Wellness Programs Grow More Popular With Employers

docs.lead_paragraph: Gov. Mary Fallin signed a bill to further restrict the use of abortion-inducing drugs in Oklahoma, despite objections from opponents who say it will force more women to have surgical abortions.
docs.abstract: Oklahoma Gov Mary Fallin signs a bill to further restrict the use of abortion-inducing drugs in state, despite objections from opponents who say it will force more women to have surgical abortions.
docs.snippet: Gov. Mary Fallin signed a bill to further restrict the use of abortion-inducing drugs in Oklahoma, despite objections from opponents who say it will force more women to have surgical abortions.

headline.main: The Pregnancy I Endured, and the One I Missed

docs.abstract: I didn’t want to be pregnant, and at the time, I couldn’t enjoy it on any level. Now, watching friends anticipate birth, I want what I know what I missed.
docs.snippet: I didn’t want to be pregnant, and at the time, I couldn’t enjoy it on any level. Now, watching friends anticipate birth, I want what I know what I missed.
